channel.title: chinese on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in chinese on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-31
item.description: Tesla launches ‘TeslaMic,’ a microphone for in-car karaoke (2 minute read) Tesla has launched a microphone designed for its in-car karaoke system.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-30
item.description: Future autonomous Waymo EV will be custom built for ride-hailing with no steering wheel (2 minute read) Waymo is collaborating with Geely, a Chinese automotive company, to create an EV for its US ride-hailing service.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-08
item.description: We should be teleporting, not transporting: Mark Zuckerberg; Hints Facebook Labs working on it in Clubhouse chat show (3 minute read) Mark Zuckerberg detailed Facebook’s progress in virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) in a Clubhouse meeting recently.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-20
item.description: Netflix Is Finally Adding a Streaming Roulette Feature As It Clinches 200 Million Subscriptions (2 minute read) Netflix has surpassed 200 million subscribers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-24
item.description: Elon Musk reveals Boring tunnels as he aims to eliminate city traffic (3 minute read) Elon Musk has revealed renders of the first commercial station being built by his tunnel-digging company.
